attributes.action: stop signing away our rights to europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop the Tony Blair signing any papers on Europe that the elected government will be unable to renegotiate when he leaves office later this year i.e the European Constitution. In fact I think the PM should not sign any important papers without full consultation from now untill he resigns.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=referendum
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
